Non-negotiables (reinforced up-front).Zero Invention: Compose only from exemplars and battle-tested research/patterns. See Section 1.

Non-negotiables (reinforced up-front).Real Tools Only: No simulated/emulated tools or fabricated results. Every material action must have receipts. See Section 6.
